name: robin hat & scarf
sizes_available: one size - hat measures 10.5" wide x 9.5" tall, scarf measures 6" wide x 78" long.
notes:
*get cozy this fall with the robin crochet hat & scarf!* 

your autumn adventures just got a stylish upgrade. this isn’t your grandma’s granny square—chunky yarn and a bold, earthy color palette make this set modern, fresh, and totally eye-catching. mix and match your favorite colors to create a one-of-a-kind hat & scarf that will turn heads from the pumpkin patch to your favorite coffee shop.

*[view this pattern for free on my blog!][1]*

**materials**

* 520 yards super bulky weight yarn in 6 colors. sample uses lion brand re-spun thick & quick in evergreen, cider, cameo, spruce, pumice stone, and cosmos. 
* 9mm crochet hook
* scissors
* tape measure
* tapestry needle
* steam blocking supplies (garment steamer, blocking mats, rust-proof t-pins)
* rotary cutter (optional, but highly encouraged)

**techniques**

* making granny squares
* crocheting in the round
* yarn over slip stitch ribbing
* steam blocking technique

**measurements**
one size - hat measures 10.5" wide x 9.5" long when flat, scarf measures 6" wide x 78" long
